question: 2-Methyl propane can be prepared by Wurtz reaction. The haloalkanes taken along with metallic sodium and dry ether are:
explanation: Wurtz reaction couples two alkyl halides.
Coupling Isopropyl chloride (2-chloropropane) and Methyl chloride (chloromethane) can yield Isobutane (along with other products like ethane and 2,3-dimethylbutane).
